item.title: My first post
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I have been working in Financial Risk Management for the last 10+ years in financial instiutions for both Funds and Insurance. For the last two years I have started to code quite regularly in R and I have now decided to open my little blog to share any insight I will get during my studying. I will write about risk management and financial applications. Enough talking about me…let’s start!
